recipe.name: Sandra Lee's Cowboy Tri-Tip
recipe.notes: Third of six in the 2009 Tri-Tip Shootout.  Sandra Lee's show hok is based around putting at least one blatantly storebought element into the recipe.  I replaced the jarred sauce with some homegrown and it worked great.  In this case, there's certainly no sin committed in using a prepared complicated base.She's a polarizing figure -- I'm not much of a fan -- but this recipe came up fairly high in Google searches at the time and therefore demanded a try.  Prety decent.
recipe.preparation: Mix together rub ingredients and coat tri-tip, using multipe passes if necessary.  Juices will be drawn into the rub a bit so time is your friend here.The sauce should be combined in a pot and brought to a boil before simmering for fifteen minutes.  Split batch and use half for grilling mop and half for service.  Baste roast every five minutes through process.
